tasks.label: cmake-configure-nearest
tasks.command: bash -lc 'd="${fileDirname}"; while [ "$d" != "/" ] && [ ! -f "$d/CMakeLists.txt" ]; do d=$(dirname "$d"); done; if [ ! -f "$d/CMakeLists.txt" ]; then echo "No CMakeLists.txt found starting from ${fileDirname}" >&2; exit 1; fi; echo "Configuring project at: $d"; cmake -S "$d" -B "$d/build" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug'

tasks.label: cmake-build-nearest
tasks.command: bash -lc 'd="${fileDirname}"; while [ "$d" != "/" ] && [ ! -f "$d/CMakeLists.txt" ]; do d=$(dirname "$d"); done; if [ ! -f "$d/CMakeLists.txt" ]; then echo "No CMakeLists.txt found starting from ${fileDirname}" >&2; exit 1; fi; echo "Building project at: $d/build"; cmake --build "$d/build" -- -j${env:NUM_JOBS:-4}'
